meanings.sent1: She hyperbolizes her achievements to impress others.
meanings.sent2: He always hyperbolizes his fishing stories to make them more exciting.
meanings.sent3: The comedian hyperbolizes his fear of spiders to get laughs from the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement hyperbolizes the joy of winning the competition.
meanings.sent5: The movie hyperbolizes the hero's strength to make him seem invincible.

meanings.definition: To make something seem more dramatic or impressive than it really is
meanings.sent1: The advertisement hyperbolizes the benefits of the product.
meanings.sent2: His speech hyperbolizes the importance of teamwork in the project.
meanings.sent3: The chef hyperbolizes the deliciousness of his signature dish.
meanings.sent4: The artist hyperbolizes the beauty of the sunset in his painting.
meanings.sent5: The author hyperbolizes the danger in the protagonist's journey to create suspense.
